exercise.title: Malicious Traffic Analysis - Part 3
exercise.name: mnta_p3
exercise.shortdescription: Analyze a pcap to figure out how a computer was infected.
exercise.description: Analyze a pcap to figure out how a computer was infected.
exercise.tutorial:
There is a pcap of traffic from an infected computer, in the share drive on your defensive workstation titled malicious_traffic_p3.pcap. Analyze the traffic, and figure out how the infection happened.

Using Wireshark and answer the questions below.

question.text: What is the infected computer's IP address?
What is the infected computer's MAC address?
What is the infected computer's host name?
What is the infected computer's operating system?
What is the date and time of the activity?
What is the SHA256 hash of the malware that infected the computer?
